backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON containing summaries of frontend files describing an informational page explaining platform capabilities and limitations regarding Android APK development.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'Platform Capability Mismatch - Android Browser Request' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component displaying an informational page explaining that the platform builds web applications on Internet Computer, not Android APKs or native browsers, with detailed capability descriptions and alternatives.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing Internet Computer actor creation with authentication support, handling both anonymous and authenticated identities with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal placeholder file with a basic backend health check hook; designed for future backend integration expansion.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system featuring blue-purple theme (hue 250) with enhanced contrast for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with OKLCH color system, Inter font family, custom animations, and extended design tokens for a modern UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata indicating a new project named 'Platform Capability Mismatch - Android Browser Request' with no features, issues, or architectural notes.
